#summary Authentication & authorisation

The Atlas uses the [http://www.jasig.org/cas Central Authentication Service] to provide single sign-on authentication for ALA applications. The app integration of CAS is described [http://code.google.com/p/ala-bie/wiki/Authentication here].

Emmet is a user authentication, account management and access control framework developed by the eResearch Group, University of Queensland.  The Atlas uses Emmet to create and manage user accounts.  The ALA customised version of Emmet is in a google code project called [http://code.google.com/p/ala-bie/source/browse/trunk/#trunk%2Fala-emmet ala-emmet].
